definitions.text: a person who is regarded as underhanded and furtive and contemptible
someone who prowls or sneaks about; usually with unlawful intentions
someone acting as an informer or decoy for the police

examples: ..stead of sneaking around spying on the neighbor's house

definitions.text: put, bring, or take in a secretive or furtive manner
make off with belongings of others

examples: He slipped me the key when nobody was looking

definitions.text: marked by quiet and caution and secrecy; taking pains to avoid being observed
examples: a surreptitious glance at his watch
